NavBarLinks.main_description: Explore the main page of Botiskaf, your ultimate crypto trading assistant. Learn more about its features and benefits.
NavBarLinks.main_keywords: Botiskaf, crypto trading bot, main page, home, crypto bot, trading assistant
NavBarLinks.commands_description: Discover all the commands and functionalities of Botiskaf for seamless crypto trading automation.
NavBarLinks.commands_keywords: Botiskaf commands, crypto trading commands, trading automation, bot commands, trading bot functionalities
NavBarLinks.faq_description: Find answers to frequently asked questions about Botiskaf, its strategies, and features.
NavBarLinks.faq_keywords: Botiskaf FAQ, crypto bot FAQ, trading bot questions, frequently asked questions, Botiskaf support
NavBarLinks.pricing_description: Learn about Botiskaf's pricing plans and find the best option for your crypto trading needs.
NavBarLinks.pricing_keywords: Botiskaf pricing, trading bot pricing, crypto bot plans, affordable trading bot, Botiskaf costs
NavBarLinks.useful-info_description: Get valuable tips, resources, and guides on using Botiskaf and improving your crypto trading.
NavBarLinks.useful-info_keywords: crypto trading tips, Botiskaf resources, trading guides, crypto bot information, useful crypto resources

MainPage.title: Main
MainPage.welcome_message: Welcome to the world of automated trading!
MainPage.for_automated_trading: for automated trading on the exchange
MainPage.why_us_bullet_one_part_two: : We're not a huge corporation, so we pay attention to details and consider user needs
MainPage.why_us_bullet_two_part_two: : Our bot is designed for maximum simplicity and productivity
MainPage.why_us_bullet_three_part_two: : We're constantly working on improving and adding new features
MainPage.why_us_bullet_four_part_two: : We're honest with our users and open to feedback and suggestions
MainPage.why_us_bullet_five_part_two: : Our bot is suitable for both beginners and experienced traders
MainPage.about_us_description: We are a small team of developers and enthusiasts united by the desire to create convenient and efficient tools for successful trading. Over the years in the crypto space, we have accumulated valuable experience and are happy to share our developments with you.

CommandsPage.title: Commands
CommandsPage.start_description: Get started with the Telegram bot.
CommandsPage.update_api_keys_description: Allows you to update API keys for connecting to the exchange. Keys will only be updated when all three values are changed to new ones.
CommandsPage.get_api_details_description: Shows the current API keys you've used for connection.
CommandsPage.update_trade_settings_description: Allows you to change the settings of your trading strategy.
CommandsPage.cancel_description: Cancels the current action and returns you to the main menu.
CommandsPage.get_subscription_status_description: Shows the status of your subscription and its expiration date.
CommandsPage.renew_subscription_description: Allows you to renew your subscription. Renewal is possible no earlier than 3 weeks before the end of the current subscription.
CommandsPage.start_trading_description: Starts the trading process with the current settings.
CommandsPage.set_language_description: Allows you to choose the language for interacting with the bot.
CommandsPage.buy_coin_description: Performs a purchase of cryptocurrency for a specific amount at the current rate.
CommandsPage.buy_coin_description_additional: The bot will ask you to enter the purchase amount in USDT.
CommandsPage.current_balance_description: the amount in USDT that the bot can use to make trades.
CommandsPage.profit_percent_description: The percentage that the bot will use to calculate the selling price from the purchase price.
CommandsPage.step_percent_description: The percentage that the bot will use to calculate the purchase price from the last purchase/sale price.
CommandsPage.buy_amount_description: The amount in USDT that the bot can use to make trades.
